text: (Ase kelyasa) amhi tara allahavara khota aropa thevu jara tumacya dharmata paratuna alo. Vastavika allahane amhala tyatuna mukta kele ahe ani amacyasathi tyata punha paratane sakya nahi, parantu he ki allaha jara icchila, jo amaca svami, palanakarta ahe. Amacya palanakartyane pratyeka gostisa apalya jnanane gheruna thevale ahe. Amhi apalya allahavaraca bharosa kela ahe. He amacya palanakartya! Amacya ani amacya lokancya daramyana phaisala kara satyasaha ani tu sarvanta uttama phaisala karanara ahe
